metadata.title: Baba is You - Innovative Puzzle Game
metadata.description: Discover 'Baba is You,' an award-winning puzzle game where you change the rules to solve challenges. Test your logic and creativity now!
metadata.keywords: Baba is You, Baba is You game, puzzle game, creative puzzle game, indie game

hero.h1: Baba is You - Change the Rules, Challenge Your Logic!
hero.p: 'Baba is You' is a unique puzzle game where you manipulate rule blocks to create entirely new ways to solve puzzles. Dive into this critically acclaimed game and unleash your creativity!

gameFeatures.title: Game Features
features: Innovative mechanics: Change the rules of the game by moving rule blocks.
Diverse level design: Over 200 levels to challenge your logical thinking.
Cross-platform support: Available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Google Play, and App Store.
Award-winning gameplay: Winner of the Independent Games Festival's Best Design Award and Audience Award.
Endless creativity: Explore countless solutions and let your imagination run wild.

gameplayInstructions.title: How to Play
instructions: Download and install 'Baba is You' on your device.
Familiarize yourself with basic rule blocks like 'Baba Is You' and 'Flag Is Win.'
Move rule blocks to modify game logic and achieve your goals.
Complete level objectives (e.g., touching the flag) to win.
Enjoy the game while challenging your logic and creativity!

questions.question: What platforms is 'Baba is You' available on?
questions.answer: The game is available on PC, Nintendo Switch, Google Play, and App Store.

questions.question: Is the game suitable for all ages?
questions.answer: Yes, 'Baba is You' is a puzzle game suitable for players of all ages.

questions.question: Does the game include in-app purchases?
questions.answer: The game is a one-time purchase and includes all levels without additional in-app purchases.

questions.question: Where can I download 'Baba is You'?
questions.answer: You can download the game from major platforms like Steam, Google Play, and the App Store.

questions.question: Does the game support multiple languages?
questions.answer: Yes, 'Baba is You' supports multiple languages, including English and Chinese.
